jobTitle: Front End Web Developer, R&D design team.
jobDescription:
Working with a team of designers / developers that are responsible for Plus500's products: main website, affiliates website, web trader, Native applications (iOS, Android), Email design implementation (Email client compatability) & inner applications that are used by several teams.

I've helped maintaining an email builder interface that is used by content team used to build Emails & export the markup into localization.
I was also in charge of Plus500 website (regulated, multilingual, dark theme supported, accessible). Covered both frontend & backend (CSHTML, SCSS, .NET C#) in an MVC paradigm, by doing so saved time & resources of other teams

Learned how to managem NPM packages & NodeJS, implemented Gulp task runner script which took care of SASS (compilation), JS (minification & bundling).

Perfected website load time using Lighthouse auditing tool: font load delivery, images lazy load optimization of styles (with component driven design).

Worked with Bootstrap 3-5 & Zurb's Foundation CSS frameworks.

Built Chrome extensions that helped me complete tedious tasks and saved me precious time.

I've been in charge of WordPress websites (installations, maintenance, optimization, customization to both frontend & backend), Lead the development of an interactive accessibility tool for people with disabilities. Helped with building of web applications & worked with various API's, took part in creating ERP interfaces. Optimized websites with the recommendations of google PAGE INSIGHTS (such as: caching, minification, content delivery).

Learned AngularJS, gained more PHP & MYSQL experience. Started working with GIT & AWS services (EC2, S3).

Created a unique accessibility tool for the company which covered 65% of WCGA AA requirements. I was in charge of website innovation, required research on my part in UX / UI. Helped implementing methods for Google Analytics Events, later on with Google's Tag Manager. Implemented several jQuery galleries & plugins, also wrote some of my own. Customized the "Bsmart" application backend system for the client needs.

Learned working with Bootstrap, perfected JavaScript & jQuery Skills. Mainly worked with XSLT, HTML5, ASP, CSS, JavaScript & jQuery.

Installation, maintenance & customization of Drupal, Joomla & WordPress websites. Worked with Cpanel, Control Web Panel (opensource web panel), Plesk & DirectAdmin.

Creation of landing pages.
Worked as a freelance web developer, mainly created static HTML / CSS websites & landing pages.
